actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Administrator of General Services to provide space in the Old Post Office Building to tenants approved by the Chairman of the National Endowment for the Arts.

summary.text: Authorizes the Administrator of General Services to provide space in the Old Post Office Building in the District of Columbia to persons designated by the National Endowment for the Arts as being engaged in artistic or cultural enterprises at rentals approximating commercial charges for other Federal buildings space.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Administrator of General Services to provide space in the Old Post Office Building to tenants approved by the Chairman of the National Endowment for the Arts.
